title: Nicholas Hoult Teams Up With Drug Smuggler in 'Collide' First Trailer
text:
Comments After a heist goes awry, Casey Stein (Hoult) finds himself on the run from a rogue gang and must find a way to save the love of his life. 
The first trailer for Eran Creevy's heist movie " Collide " has arrived. Starring Nicholas Hoult and Felicity Jones , the movie slips a romantic story amidst epic action sequences. Hoult stars as Casey Stein, a rookie thief who finds himself on the run from a ruthless gang headed by Hagen ( Anthony Hopkins ) after a heist didn't go as planned. The one-minute video starts with Stein and his girlfriend Juliette (Jones) engaging in a car chase which ends with a fatal crash. Stein is threatened by Hagen because he carries precious stuff that belongs to the mob boss. When the life of his long-time girlfriend is in danger, Stein calls his former employer and drug smuggler Geran ( Ben Kingsley ) to make sure that Juliette will be safe. "You told me that if you die, you want me to move on, forget about you, but I can't do that. That's not us," Stein says to Juliette. Besides directing, Creevy co-writes the script alongside F. Scott Frazier (" The Numbers Station "). The action thriller movie will be released Stateside later this year.
